name: BREAK THROUGH
description:
Breakthrough" is an action game in which you fight giant enemy robots.
Equip weapons that fall on six floating bits and destroy the enemy's parts.
Enemies can be won by destroying their cores, which are located somewhere on their body.
Manipulate the six bits to eliminate all enemies.

Features

  • Comprised of four stages, you can experience one-on-one action against huge enemies.
  • Find your own unique fighting style by making full use of weapons with various abilities!
  • Experience how good it feels when you can handle six bits at your disposal!
